titleStmt.title: A vindication of the Church of Scotland being an answer to a paper, intituled, Some questions concerning Episcopal and Presbyterial government in Scotland : wherein the latter is vindicated from the arguments and calumnies of that author, and the former is made appear to be a stranger in that nation/ by a minister of the Church of Scotland, as it is now established by law.
titleStmt.author: Rule, Gilbert, 1629?-1701.

titleStmt.title: A vindication of the Church of Scotland being an answer to a paper, intituled, Some questions concerning Episcopal and Presbyterial government in Scotland : wherein the latter is vindicated from the arguments and calumnies of that author, and the former is made appear to be a stranger in that nation/ by a minister of the Church of Scotland, as it is now established by law.
titleStmt.author: Rule, Gilbert, 1629?-1701.

notesStmt.note: Written by Gilbert Rule. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.)
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
